text: Jules Bel (30 September 1842 – 11 January 1904) was a French cheese maker. He was the founder of the Groupe Bel. ==Early life== Jules Bel was born on 30 September 1842 in Chambéria, in rural France.Jules Bel, GeneaNet ==Career== In 1865, Bel started his cheese company.Bel Group: Company History: A behind the scenes look at the Bel saga ==Personal life== He married Adèle Odile Colombet. ==Death== He died on 11 January 1904 in Orgelet, France. ==References== Category:1842 births Category:1904 deaths Category:People from Franche-Comté Category:Cheesemakers Category:French company founders
title: Jules Bel
